titleStmt.title: Poor Robins observations upon Whitsun-holidays. Concerning the fair and foul weather happening thereon. Together with the manly exercise of the Cornish-men of hurling the ball in Hide-Park on Whitsun-Tuesday last.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "VVHat ails ye o ye clouds why do you frown ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
